item.title: Kelly add a quote by A.A. Milne
Kelly add a quote by A.A. Milne
item.description: "If ever there is tomorrow when we're not together... there is something you must always remember. You are braver than you believe, stronger than you seem, and smarter than you think. But the most important thing is, even if we're apart... I'll always be with you." -- A.A. Milne

item.title: Kelly add a quote by A.A. Milne
item.description: "I don't see much sense in that," said Rabbit. "No," said Pooh humbly, "there isn't. But there was going to be when I began it. It's just that something happened to it along the way." -- A.A. Milne

item.title: Kelly add a quote by A.A. Milne
item.description: "We'll be Friends Forever, won't we, Pooh?' asked Piglet. Even longer,' Pooh answered." -- A.A. Milne

item.title: Kelly add a quote by A.A. Milne
item.description: "You never can tell with bees." -- A.A. Milne

item.title: Kelly add a quote by A.A. Milne
item.description: "If you live to be a hundred, I want to live to be a hundred minus one day so I never have to live without you." -- A.A. Milne

item.title: Kelly add a quote by A.A. Milne
item.description: "What I say is that, if a man really likes potatoes, he must be a pretty decent sort of fellow." -- A.A. Milne

item.title: Kelly add a quote by Joan Bauer
item.description: "You've got to love yourself with all your short comings, and you've got to love the world no matter how bad it gets." -- Joan Bauer

item.title: Kelly add a quote by A.A. Milne
item.description: "I'm not lost for I know where I am. But however, where I am may be lost." -- A.A. Milne

item.title: Kelly add a quote by Joan Bauer
item.description: "You don't know which way a thing will come at you, but you need to welcome it with your whole heart which ever way it arrives." -- Joan Bauer

item.title: Kelly add a quote by A.A. Milne
item.description: "Weeds are flowers, too, once you get to know them." -- A.A. Milne

item.title: Kelly add a quote by Charlotte Brontë
item.description: "Am I hideous, Jane? Very, sir: you always were, you know." -- Charlotte Brontë

item.title: Kelly add a quote by A.A. Milne
item.description: "One of the advantages of being disorganized is that one is always having surprising discoveries." -- A.A. Milne

item.title: Kelly add a quote by Charlotte Brontë
item.description: "I had not intended to love him; the reader knows I had wrought hard to extirpate from my soul the germs of love there detected; and now, at the first renewed view of him, they spontaneously revived, great and strong! He made me love him without looking at me." -- Charlotte Brontë

item.title: Kelly add a quote by A.A. Milne
Kelly add a quote by Jane Austen
item.description: "The person, be it gentleman or lady, who has not pleasure in a good novel, must be intolerably stupid." -- Jane Austen

item.title: Kelly add a quote by A.A. Milne
item.description: "Don't underestimate the value of Doing Nothing, of just going along, listening to all the things you can't hear, and not bothering." -- A.A. Milne

item.title: Kelly add a quote by Jane Austen
item.description: "I do not want people to be very agreeable, as it saves me the trouble of liking them a great deal." -- Jane Austen

item.title: Kelly add a quote by A.A. Milne
item.description: "How lucky I am to have something that makes saying goodbye so hard." -- A.A. Milne

item.title: Kelly add a quote by Jane Austen
item.description: "It is a truth universally acknowledged, that a single man in possession of a good fortune, must be in want of a wife." -- Jane Austen

item.title: Kelly add a quote by Jane Austen
item.description: "In vain have I struggled. It will not do. My feelings will not be repressed. You must allow me to tell you how ardently I admire and love you." -- Jane Austen

item.title: Kelly add a quote by Jane Austen
item.description: "But there certainly are not so many men of large fortune in the world as there are pretty women to deserve them." -- Jane Austen

item.title: Kelly add a quote by J.M. Barrie
item.description: "To die would be an awfully big adventure." -- J.M. Barrie

item.title: Kelly add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "Would you like a cough drop Dolores?" -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Kelly add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Kelly add a quote by Marcus Tullius Cicero
item.description: "A room without books is like a body without a soul." -- Marcus Tullius Cicero

item.title: Kelly add a quote by Eleanor Roosevelt
item.description: "No one can make you feel inferior without your consent." -- Eleanor Roosevelt

item.title: Kelly add a quote by Narcotics Anonymous
item.description: "Insanity is doing the same thing, over and over again, but expecting different results." -- Narcotics Anonymous

item.title: Kelly add a quote by Frank Zappa
item.description: "So many books, so little time." -- Frank Zappa

item.title: Kelly add a quote by Maurice Switzer
item.description: "It is better to remain silent at the risk of being thought a fool, than to talk and remove all doubt of it." -- Maurice Switzer
